response.overview: Khiladi Rockstar (Johnny Johnny Yes Papa) 2018 Hindi Dubbed Watch Online The story is about Johnny (Duniya Vijay) and his ‘adopted’ father Pappu (Rangayana Raghu) along with their side kick Beeja aka B Jayaram (Hemanth) The trio run a company, Johnny.com, which has the outlook of a software firm, but works towards social causes. Enters Priya (Rachita Ram) who dreams of flying to the USA. However, her father, played by Achyuth Kumar, is not in favour of his only daughter going abroad. Will he get help from Johnny and Pappu in convincing his daughter, and will Johnny, who develops a romantic feel towards her, express his love.
response.title: Johnny Johnny Yes Papa
